onset.Description: Onset of the event relative to the start.

duration.Description: Duration of the event in seconds.

trial_type.Description: The type, category, or name of the event.

Levels.Stimulus/S 31: 3-letter sample; test object absent in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S 32: 3-letter sample; test object present in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S 61: 6-letter sample; test object absent in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S 62: 6-letter sample; test object present in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S 91: 9-letter sample; test object absent in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S 92: 9-letter sample; test object present in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S121: 12-letter sample; test object absent in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S122: 12-letter sample; test object present in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S151: 15-letter sample; test object absent in the encoding set
Levels.Stimulus/S152: 15-letter sample; test object present in the encoding set

value.Description: The event code (also known as trigger code or event ID) associated with the event.

sample.Description: The event onset time in number of sampling points.
